official-title.#text:
Supporting the goals and ideals of the
		  MAGIC Foundation.

cosponsor.#tail:
) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to
			 the
cosponsor.#text:
Mr. Danny K. Davis of
			 Illinois

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: supports the goals and ideals of the MAGIC Foundation.

text.#text:
Whereas conditions causing growth failure may affect a
			 child’s overall health;

Whereas short stature may be a symptom of a serious
			 underlying condition;
Whereas growth failure in children is often missed;

Whereas the longer a child goes undiagnosed, the greater
			 the potential for damage and higher costs of care;

Whereas early detection and the diagnosis of growth
			 failure is crucial for a healthy future;

Whereas public awareness and education is a vital public
			 service;

Whereas providing resources for identification of growth
			 failure will allow for early detection;

Whereas to this day, the MAGIC Foundation remains
			 committed to its goals and visions in helping to educate families and the
			 public about growth failure; and

Whereas the MAGIC Foundation has designated the third week
			 of September as

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HRES 313 IH: Supporting the goals and ideals of the MAGIC Foundation.
